content: blue sky fibers complimentary pattern covington cowl design by bobbi intveld no 1610 no 1634 no 1637 opal a rose quartz b copper c color shown color shown color shown experience level - advanced beginner materials - metalico 50% baby alpaca 50% silk 50g/147yds 2 hanks a 2 hanks b 2 hanks c - size f 3 75mm hook or size needed to obtain gauge size - one finished measurements - circumference 24½ blocked - height 17 blocked gauge - in linen stitch 24 sts and 27 row = 4 blocked abbreviations chain chain *yarn over hook draw through loop on hook to form chain stitch repeat from * as many times as instructed chain-space chain space covington cowl no 202507 fo fasten_off hk hook design by bobbi intveld pattern meas measures repeat repeat crocheted flat and seamed this luxurious linen stitch cowl uses three beautiful colors of metalico single_crochet single_crochet insert hook in indicated stitch yarn over and pull up a loop yarn over and draw through 2 loops on hook skip skip space space * repeat the directions between the asterisks as many times as indicated complimentary pattern blue sky fibers notes this piece is crocheted flat and seamed cowl with a chain 152 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hk single_crochet in each chain to end ch1 turn 151 single_crochet set up row with b * skip next single_crochet single_crochet in single_crochet ch1 repeat from * until 1 chain rem single_crochet in last chain ch1 turn row 1 with c * single_crochet in ch1-space ch1 skip single_crochet repeat from * until 1 chain rem single_crochet in last chain ch1 turn row 2 with a * single_crochet in ch1-space ch1 skip single_crochet repeat from * until 1 chain rem single_crochet in last chain ch1 turn row 3 with b * single_crochet in ch1-space ch1 skip single_crochet repeat from * until 1 chain rem single_crochet in last chain ch1 turn repeat last 3 row until piece meas 16 or to desired height next row with c repeat row 1 one time fo finishing cowl is reversible sew side edges together weave in ends block to finished measurements care instructions hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid water using a mild soap do not twist shape and dry flat on a
